# iosxr_mpls_ldp_vrf (Data Source)

This data source can read the MPLS LDP VRF configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_mpls_ldp_vrf" "example" {
  vrf_name = "VRF1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vrf_name` (String) Configure VRF parameters

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `address_family_ipv4` (Boolean) IPv4
- `address_family_ipv4_discovery_transport_address_ip` (String) IP address to be used as transport address
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_disable` (Boolean) Disable label advertisement to all peers for all prefixes
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_explicit_null` (Boolean) Configure explicit-null advertisement
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_explicit_null_for_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on destination prefixes
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_explicit_null_for_acl_to_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on LDP Peers
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_explicit_null_to_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on LDP Peers
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_interfaces` (Attributes List) Advertise interface host address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_interfaces))
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_to_neighbors` (Attributes List) neighbor (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family_ipv4_label_local_advertise_to_neighbors))
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_allocate_for_acl` (String) IP access-list
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_allocate_for_host_routes` (Boolean) Allocate label for host routes only
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_default_route` (Boolean) Enable MPLS forwarding for default route
- `address_family_ipv4_label_local_implicit_null_override_for` (String) Limit implicit-null label use to a set of prefixes
- `address_family_ipv4_label_remote_accept_from_neighbors` (Attributes List) Neighbor from whom to accept label advertisement (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family_ipv4_label_remote_accept_from_neighbors))
- `address_family_ipv6` (Boolean) IPv6
- `address_family_ipv6_discovery_transport_address_ip` (String) IP address to be used as transport address
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_disable` (Boolean) Disable label advertisement to all peers for all prefixes
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_explicit_null` (Boolean) Configure explicit-null advertisement
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_explicit_null_for_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on destination prefixes
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_explicit_null_for_acl_to_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on LDP Peers
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_explicit_null_to_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on LDP Peers
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_interfaces` (Attributes List) Advertise interface host address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_interfaces))
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_to_neighbors` (Attributes List) neighbor (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family_ipv6_label_local_advertise_to_neighbors))
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_allocate_for_acl` (String) IP access-list
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_allocate_for_host_routes` (Boolean) Allocate label for host routes only
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_default_route` (Boolean) Enable MPLS forwarding for default route
- `address_family_ipv6_label_local_implicit_null_override_for` (String) Limit implicit-null label use to a set of prefixes
- `address_family_ipv6_label_remote_accept_from_neighbors` (Attributes List) Neighbor from whom to accept label advertisement (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--address_family_ipv6_label_remote_accept_from_neighbors))
- `graceful_restart_helper_peer_maintain_on_local_reset_for` (String) Access list of LDP Peers
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `interfaces` (Attributes List) Enable LDP on an interface and enter interface submode (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces))
- `neighbors` (Attributes List) neighbor (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors))
- `neighbors_password_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies an ENCRYPTED password will follow
- `router_id` (String) Configure router Id
- `session_downstream_on_demand_with` (String) Access list of LDP Peers

### Nested Schema for `interfaces`

Read-Only:

- `address_family_ipv4` (Boolean) IPv4
- `address_family_ipv4_discovery_transport_address_interface` (Boolean) Use this interface address as transport address
- `address_family_ipv4_discovery_transport_address_ip` (String) IP address to be used as transport address
- `address_family_ipv6` (Boolean) IPv6
- `address_family_ipv6_discovery_transport_address_interface` (Boolean) Use this interface address as transport address
- `address_family_ipv6_discovery_transport_address_ip` (String) IP address to be used as transport address

### Nested Schema for `neighbors`

Read-Only:

- `label_space_id` (Number) Label Space Id of neighbor
- `neighbor_address` (String) configure this node
- `password_disable` (Boolean) Disables the global password from this neighbor
- `password_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies an ENCRYPTED password will follow
